subject: Football
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Military)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: While U.S.C. had not confirmed Coach Pete Carroll’s departure as of Saturday night, the impact of the potential move was already taking a toll on its recruiting class.
snippet: While U.S.C. had not confirmed Coach Pete Carroll’s departure as of Saturday night, the impact of the potential move was already taking a toll on its recruiting class.
